tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE statutes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  statute_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  enacted_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE regulations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  enforcement_date DATE,
  related_statute_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (related_statute_id) REFERENCES statutes(id)
)

CREATE TABLE legal_statutes (
  statute_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  statute_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  jurisdiction VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  enactment_date DATE,
  enforcement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE regulations (
  regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  jurisdiction VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  enactment_date DATE,
  enforcement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  statute_id INT REFERENCES legal_statutes(statute_id),
  regulation_id INT REFERENCES regulations(regulation_id),
  compliance_date DATE,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE legal_statutes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    statute_name VARCHAR(255),
    statute_description TEXT,
    effective_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_regulations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
    regulation_description TEXT,
    compliance_deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_checks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    check_name VARCHAR(255),
    check_description TEXT,
    due_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    check_id INT,
    result VARCHAR(50),
    completion_date DATE
)
